relating to the scientific study of animals, especially their structure: They studied him like a zoological specimen. zoological research/classification See

More examplesFewer examplesLeonard was a trailblazing researcher in the science of animal reproduction who imparted his zoological knowledge to thousands of students. The 55-acre zoological garden is open year-round to the public. The zoological society does far more than just showcase the crowd-pleasers at the zoo.
